paragraph: Jiří Kabeš, alias Kába (* 26 March 1946 in Křemín, Czechoslovakia) is a Czech rock singer, violist, violinist, guitarist and songwriter. He was a longtime member of The Plastic People of the Universe where he played on viola and violin, occasionally sang and played on theremin. In the early seventies he played with rock'n'roll group The Old Teenagers. Since 1997 he is also a member of The Velvet Underground Revival Band where he plays the guitar. He was also a member of Milan Hlavsa's band called Půlnoc and Echt!.
